questions.quote: Well I'm very disappointed in George and Elaine. And you know I'm somebody you don't want to have on your bad side.
You do realize, of course, these are illegal in your country.
Nah, he was tired. He had some feet in his face. My cousin Holly is completely insane. She keeps calling and accusing me of stealing her napkins.
See that was nice, Jerry.  Oh, by the way, I'm the one who broke your trunk.
Oh... ...clothing, something, I dunno. So, uh, what are you doing today?
Yeah, I just wanna run and get a beer. I'll be back in a minute.
Do you know how much that comes to? That's a nickel a day for 20 years. It's going to be $50,000
Well does it say anywhere in the contract about my car being used as a whorehouse? 'Cause I don't remember reading that clause either..
Well, you can't have it! In fact maybe you better just pay your check and get out.
Oh, I'll be inaugrating them this weekend, with none other than Ethel Kennedy. A woman whose triumph in the face of tragedy is exceeded only by her proclivity to procreate.
